about_the_game:
This fulsome fusillade of modern music from composer Joel Steudler has your game covered with a huge variety of tracks. You'll find fast paced, hard hitting metal and electronica. Then you'll find slow, soft, romantic tracks and peacefully paced background music. THEN you'll find retro themes recalling legends of the synth age. You will find even more than that; there are so many tracks! Really, it is a lot of music.

Features:

- 40 BGM tracks suitable for battle, conversations, dungeons, retro, romance, themes and towns!
- .ogg, and .m4a formats included

Bonus tracks:

- 'Clean Mix' for Corporate Hellevator
- 'Retro 1983' version of Ordinary Day
- Looping version of Lightning Rider (.ogg only)

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
